alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 13 at 10:42PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AREAS OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW TONIGHT... Areas of Lake Effect Snow have increased in intensity along Southern Lake and Northern Bayfield Counties. Expect a reduction in visibilities as low as a half a mile. Heavy snow will continue for a few more hours then the precipitation should become light snow. Southern Lake County can expect a quick half inch to inch in accumulation and northern Bayfield County could experience a quick 1 to 3 inches. This will likely coat roadways and cause slick conditions. Please use extreme caution... especially on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
